title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

WEDNESDAY OCTOBER 23, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

Lust and/or loot are on your mind today Rams, but resist the urge to be extravagant and overspend. And don’t underestimate the power of your nightly dreams to plant creative ideas in your mind.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ***

You’re in the mood for some on-the-job fun, as the Sun and Mars activate your work zone. You’re keen to move ahead with confidence and chutzpah. Don’t neglect domestic duties though!

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

You’re very focused on nurturing loved ones today Twins. Singles - you have a better chance of finding your soulmate if you are proactive, enthusiastic, adventurous and cast your net wide.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

A partnership is undergoing profound change … like a snake shedding its skin. Circumstances are challenging, but remember you’re in the process of creating a firm new relationship base.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ****

Are you ready to party like a pro? You’re in charismatic Cat mode, as the Moon moves through your sign. So it’s time to sparkle, shine and socialise in your own unique and special Leo way!

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

The buzz word today is communication. The more open you are with expressing your thoughts and feelings, the more others will respond in positive ways. Community projects are also favoured.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

The winds of change are blowing! So your motto for the moment is from Libran actress Kate Winslet. “The good and bad things are what form us as people … change makes us grow.”

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ****

Mercury and Venus are visiting your sign. So your motto for the moment is from fellow Scorpio, Katie Perry. “If you’re presenting yourself with confidence, you can pull off pretty much anything.”

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

The Moon/Jupiter connection promises an action-packed day for adventurous Sagittarians. You’re in the mood for some fabulous fun but don’t over-promise and then under-deliver.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

Make sure you plan ahead, and set goals with the big picture in mind. Small dramas and minor irritations will fade into the background, as you look to the future with excitement and enthusiasm.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ****

The stars highlight travel, study and all forms of communication as you socialise with a wide range of people, and cover a multitude of conversation topics. There’s always something new to learn.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

Professional matters look promising today Pisces. So it’s a wonderful time to start a work project, socialise with colleagues or look for a fabulous new job. Make sure you dress for success.

YOUR DAY

Avoid taking on more than you can actually deliver.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

If you turn your creative talents into practical projects, you’ll be unstoppable. The best months for love and romance are December and January, so plan something special.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
